pokedex.name: Bulbasaur
pokedex.description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

pokedex.name: Ivysaur
pokedex.description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokedex.name: Venusaur
pokedex.description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokedex.name: Charmander
pokedex.description: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokedex.name: Charmeleon
pokedex.description: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

pokedex.name: Charizard
pokedex.description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokedex.name: Squirtle
pokedex.description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pokedex.name: Wartortle
pokedex.description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

pokedex.name: Blastoise
pokedex.description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high-speed tackles.

pokedex.name: Caterpie
pokedex.description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokedex.name: Metapod
pokedex.description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its tender body.

pokedex.name: Butterfree
pokedex.description: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokedex.name: Weedle
pokedex.description: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

pokedex.name: Kakuna
pokedex.description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself.

pokedex.name: Beedrill
pokedex.description: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

pokedex.name: Pidgey
pokedex.description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

pokedex.name: Pidgeotto
pokedex.description: Very protective of its sprawling territory, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at intruders.

pokedex.name: Pidgeot
pokedex.description: When hunting, it skims the surface of water at high speed to pick off unwary prey.

pokedex.name: Rattata
pokedex.description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and quick, it is a common sight in many places.

pokedex.name: Raticate
pokedex.description: Its hind feet are webbed, enabling it to swim across rivers. It uses its whiskers to maintain balance.
